titleStmt.title: Mattheson: Der Ober-Classe zweiundzwanzigstes Probstück (english translation)

sourceDesc.p: This is an original digital text.

div.p: Right at the beginning it should be noted that where the leap from c# to a# occurs, a b must be played in between the notes as an appoggiatura with a short trill.

When thereafter everything has been neatly played up to the cadence in the eleventh measure, a melody has to be invented in the right hand and to be continued for about ten measures, up to the subsequent cadence to C#, approximately in the following manner:
